input.sentences: the trains were frozen to the rails .
berries on the trees were covered in ice .
ice on plants formed hard spiky carapaces .
no transportation was running at all .
output.sentences: The winter was particularly brutal that year.
Especially since the town was industrial, the wind seemed even more biting.
The season had come on all of a sudden, when it seemed that nature was still bountiful.
The sharp ice jealously safeguarded the berries from harvest.
Nonetheless, the trains ran on schedule.
